title: Cross-Cultural Learning in Technical and Professional Communication (TPC): Service Learning Design Based on Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Technical Documentation and Design Methodologies, Intermediate-Level Expertise in Mathematical Concepts
context.additional_context: A mobile-based service learning program for corporate managers/leaders to strengthen intercultural communication competencies in the mathematics domain

learning_goals: Learners can design mathematics-related technical documents using three or more approaches that consider intercultural differences
Through service learning, learners can execute two or more culturally adaptive communication strategies required in real corporate environments
Learners can improve communication deliverables two or more times based on feedback formed in a mobile microlearning platform
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
